NAME: Azros King of Thassalos
EFFECT:
Once Per Turn:
ACTION
Select a HUMAN card
Apply + 1 ATK and SHIELD to it

This effect last until you select another card to apply this blessing

NAME: Kingdom Guardian
EFFECT:
IF This cards is attacked from it ATK DIRECTION RANGE:
Reduced the battle DMG to 0

NAME: Soldier Bombardier
EFFECT:
EXPLOSIVE
(when this card dies: apply it current ATK to DMG all cards linked to it)

NAME: Kingdom Duelist
EFFECT:
IF this card ATK a PAYBACK card
AND
their ATK is equal or higher than this card:
Ignore the PAYBACK DMG

NAME: Field Flag-bearer
EFFECT:
IF a FIELD is placed on Board:
SPAWN this card on the top of the placed FIELD card

NAME: Army of Thassalos
EFFECT:
Cannot be Healed
This card ATK is equal to its health

END OF TURN:
Lose -1 Health
SPAWN linked to this card a Simple Soldier 1/1 (EARTH)

NAME: Kingdom Spearman
EFFECT:
DASH
(Can MOVE 2 tiles without changing direction, but it cannot ATK after it)
PIERCE
(Apply DMG to all cards in Range of the selected ATK DIRECTION)

NAME: Crossroads Thief
EFFECT:
STEALTH
(This card can be SPAWN face-down. It require to be flipped face-up to ATK or activate it effect)

IF an enemy unity linked to this card MOVE:
STUN it for 1 TURN

NAME: Dragon of Thassalos
EFFECT:
SUPER SPAWN:
DMG all cards in this spawn row by 3 and apply BURN
(2 turns)

NORMAL SPAWN:
Apply the above effect.
This card can only be alive on board IF you:

TICK:
Destroy a HUMAN Unity from your Board or Hand.

NAME: Gem Prospector
EFFECT:
SPAWN:
Draw 3 cards
And then Discard 2 cards from your hand

NAME: Nightmare Seer
EFFECT:
IF this cards damage an enemy unity or LP:
Select a card from your enemy hand
they must reveal the selected card

NAME: War Mage
EFFECT:
BATTLE:
Select any unity at it ATK DIRECTION RANGE at 2 Range MAX
Apply +2 ATK or -2 ATK to the selected unity for 1 turn
(You cannot perform a BATTLE action with this card if you choose this effect)

NAME: Armor Thief
EFFECT:
IF this card have no artifacts attached to it:
ACTION
Select an attached artifact in the board
Attach the selected card to this unity instead

NAME: Sealed Exodus Guardian
EFFECT:
IF you use the effect of "Sealed Rune" and discard this at cost:
SUPER SPAWN:
This card mimics the HP and the ATK of the target that triggered the "Sealed Rune" effect and Spawn at the artifact location

ONCE PER TURN:
ACTION:
Select a unity card
Swap it ATK and HP values for 1 turn

NAME: Artifact Collector
EFFECT:
SPAWN:
Select an enemy artifact
Destroy it

IF the selected card is face-down:
Flip face-up and aplly the effect if it is an artifact, else this does nothing
